loginInfo:
If you have shopped with us before, please enter your details below.
If you are a new customer, please proceed to the Billing section.
clickHereEnter: Click here to enter your code
yourOrderQualifies: Your order qualifies for free shipping!
addMoreForFreeShipping: Add ${remaining} more to qualify for free shipping.
termsAndConditions: I have read and agree to the website terms and conditions
cryptoWarning: ⚠️ You selected Crypto. Please send the payment to the wallet address above and contact us with a screenshot of your transaction. We will process your order once we verify the payment.
cashAppStep1: Open the Cash App mobile application.
cashAppStep2: Add money to your Cash App balance before making the payment to avoid failures.
cashAppStep3: Enter the amount you want to send.
cashAppStep5: Contact us via live chat or email to get our cashtag: support@drivecoreauto.com
cashAppStep6: Enter the email, phone number, or '$Cashtag'.
cashAppStep7: Enter the reason for the payment. Example: 'ORDER #7895'.
cashAppWarning: ⚠️ Do not send Cash App payment to our website email. Please contact us via live chat or email to get the correct information.
paypalStep1: After placing your order, contact us via live chat or email to receive our PayPal details.
zelleStep1: Download the Zelle app to get started.
zelleStep2: All you need is the recipient’s email address or mobile number.
zelleStep3: Please contact us via live chat or email: support@drivecoreauto.com to receive our Zelle details.
zelleStep4: After making the payment, send us a screenshot via chat or email.
zelleStep5: Your order will be valid once we receive confirmation with your order ID.
zelleStep6: Contact us via live chat or email for assistance.
zelleWarning: ⚠️ Do not send Zelle payment to our website email. Please contact us to get the correct information.
applePayStep1: Please contact us via live chat or email after placing your order to receive our Apple Pay details.
venmoStep1: Please contact us via live chat or email after placing your order to receive our Venmo details.
